title: Can I add a third party to an activated two-party call? How do I switch between the two calls?
answer:
Yes. If you are talking on two calls using the same SIM card, you have the following options: 

 To switch between the two calls, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110533). 

 To merge the two calls into a conference call, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110534). (Note that this function is network dependent.)
